comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Italian tenor Edoardo Ferrari-Fontana: historyofthetenor.com/page.php?61 His first wife Margaret Matzenauer was a Hungarian contralto; they married in 1912, divorced in 1917. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Matzenauer

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC: Note misspelling of Ferrari-Fontana. The Met's archive lists her as Margarete Matzenauer. In November, 1915, she had parts in 4 of their productions, Götterdämmerung, Lohengrin, Samson et Delila, and Aida. archives.metoperafamily.org/archives/frame.htm

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and artolog: thanks for the additional information.  We will update the record.
